name: brainfuck-vm
description: A WebAssembly-based lightweight Brainfuck VM for Node.js

scripts.build:wasm: emcc lib/vm/bf_vm.c -o lib/vm/bf_vm.js -O3 -s WASM=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['cwrap'] -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_bfvm_run','_bfvm_mem_alloc','_bfvm_mem_free'] -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=0 -s ENVIRONMENT='node'

author: ! Ｄᴇᴠɪʟɪѕʜ ｃʜʀᴏɴɪᴄʟᴇѕ
